text.jpText:
トゥインクル・シリーズへの挑戦に向け、
カレンチャンとの本格的なトレーニングの
日々が始まる。
text.enText:
Curren Chan and I will be training in earnest 
for the Twinkle Series challenge. Curren Chan 
and the team will begin their days of 
full-scale training.

coloredText.jpText: トゥインクル・シリーズ

text.jpText:
スプリンターとしての確かな実力を
見せるカレンチャン。しかし、練習中にも
SNSを更新するなどイマイチ真剣さが見えず。
text.enText:
Curren Chan is a sprinter who has shown 
solid ability. However, even during 
practice However, she was not serious 
enough to update her social networking 
site even during practice.

text.jpText:
改めて今後について確認しても――
目標は？　『カワイイカレンを広めること』
レースの目標は？　『ん～……ないかな！』
text.enText:
If I could check in with you again about the 
future - what is your goal? To spread the 
word about Kawaii Curren. What are your goals 
for the race? "Hmmm… maybe not ……!"

text.jpText:
更に、距離適性的に達成の厳しい称号、
『トリプルティアラ』が気になるという。
彼女なりに考えはあるようだが……。
text.enText:
She is also concerned about the "Triple 
Tiara," a title that is difficult to achieve 
due to distance aptitude. She seems to have 
her own ideas about it. ……

text.jpText:
はたしてカレンチャンの本意とは？
早くも振り回されつつ、2人で
カワイイを追う日々が始まった。
text.enText:
What is Curren Chan's true intention? 
We were already being pushed around 
by her. The days of chasing "kawaii" 
between the two of us began.
